org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing

Class TokenBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • antlr.Token
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.TokenBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ISourceLocation, ICMToken
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ASDocToken, ASToken, MetadataToken

    public abstract class TokenBase
extends antlr.Token
implements ICMToken, ISourceLocation
    Base class of ASToken, MXMLToken, CSSToken

      • truncate

        public void truncate(int trimLeft,
            int trimRight)
        Reduce the span of the token by removing characters from the beginning and end. This is used to remove quote characters and such from tokens.
        Parameters:
        trimLeft - number of characters to remove from the left of the token
        trimRight - number of characters to remove from the right of the token

      • adjustOffsets

        public void adjustOffsets(int offsetAdjustment)
        Adjust all associated offsets by the adjustment amount
        Parameters:
        offsetAdjustment - amount to add to offsets

      • adjustLocation

        public void adjustLocation(int offsetAdjustment,
                  int lineAdjustment,
                  int columnAdjustment)
        Adjust all associated offsets by the adjustment amount
        Parameters:
        offsetAdjustment - amount to add to offsets
        lineAdjustment - amount to add to the line number
        columnAdjustment - amount to add to the column number

      • storeLocalOffset

        public final void storeLocalOffset()
        Capture the current start/end offsets as this token's local offsets. This method is called in StreamingASTokenizer#nextTokenFromReader() after the token is initialized, and before being updated by IncludeHandler.onNextToken(org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.as.ASToken).

      • getSourcePath

        public final String getSourcePath()
        Description copied from interface: ICMToken
        Get the source file path of the node. When the token is built from an included source, this method returns the file path of the included source. The return value can be null if the source file is not an included file, but not every non-included file has a null source path.

        The source path will be copied to ISourceLocation.getSourcePath() during tree construction.

        Specified by:
        getSourcePath in interface ISourceLocation
        Specified by:
        getSourcePath in interface ICMToken
        Returns:
        source file path or null

      • setSourcePath

        public final void setSourcePath(String path)

      • verify

        public boolean verify()
        Verifies that this token has its type and location information set.

        This is used only in asserts.

      • getAbsoluteEnd

        public int getAbsoluteEnd()
        Description copied from interface: ISourceLocation
        Gets the absolute starting offset. It is zero-based.
        Specified by:
        getAbsoluteEnd in interface ISourceLocation

        public int getAbsoluteStart()
        Description copied from interface: ISourceLocation
